dublinCore.dc:title: 115 HR 2743 IH: 85/15 Rule Act
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Ms. Maxine Waters of California introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Education and the Workforce

form.official-title: To amend the Higher Education Act of 1965 to require that proprietary institutions of higher education derive not less than fifteen percent of revenues from sources other than funds provided under title IV of such Act.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the 85/15 Rule Act.
Section 487(a)(24) of the Higher Education Act of 1965 (20 U.S.C. 1094(a)(24)) is amended by striking ten and inserting fifteen.
This Act shall take effect with respect to award year 2018â€“2019 and each succeeding award year.
